data.eml:eml: A new Heraclides swallowtail (Lepidoptera, Papilionidae) from North America is recognized by the pattern on its neck

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shiraiwa, Kojiro, Cong, Qian, Grishin, Nick V. (2014): A new Heraclides swallowtail (Lepidoptera, Papilionidae) from North America is recognized by the pattern on its neck. ZooKeys 468: 85-135, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.468.8565, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.468.8565
